article_title: Obama Administration's Lawlessness Finally Hits Home With Investors

article_metadata.description: President Obama and his administration have a well-deserved reputation for not following the law. To the chagrin of investors in Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac that disdain for legality stands to cost investors billions of dollars as the mortgage giants’ profits are diverted from shareholders to the Treasury.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman
